column4: I was running the updates on my Hardy system here and I get a warning message about /etc/gnome/defaults.list and I would like if someone could help me to make the right choice here.  http://pastebin.com/d2fbea57f
ï»¿bring3: did you see the pastebin?
looking at your paste i'd go with the new one (you could make a backup of the old one first to be able to roll back if trouble occurs)
it's a mimetype list, sort of a guide to gnome to open the correct application for all the different types of files you have on your system
